trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Peer di automazione associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> contenente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della classe di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associata a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della classe di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Hides all controls that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Nasconde tutti i controlli presenti in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Shows the controls that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Mostra i controlli presenti in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato espanso o compresso del controllo associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Stato del controllo associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: Scorre <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> nell'area visibile del contenitore.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>.
